SEARCH
Package vendingMachineSimulator

Class MainModel

java.lang.Object
vendingMachineSimulator.MainModel
public class MainModel extends Object
Serves as the main model to interact with the different parts of the vending machine
Author:
Vance Gyan M. Robles

    • purchaseSpecialItem

      public String purchaseSpecialItem(int templateIndex, ArrayList<Integer> baseIndexes, ArrayList<Integer> addonIndexes)
      Purchases a special item using the specified template index, base item indexes, and addon item indexes.
      Parameters:
      templateIndex - The index of the special item template to use.
      baseIndexes - The indexes of the base items to use in the special item.
      addonIndexes - The indexes of the addon items to use in the special item.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the status of the purchase.

    • canPurchaseSpecialItem

      public boolean canPurchaseSpecialItem(int templateIndex)
      Checks if the user can purchase a special item with the specified template index.
      Parameters:
      templateIndex - The index of the special item template.
      Returns:
      True if the user can purchase the special item, false otherwise.

      public String getWithdrawMessage()
      Retrieves the message for withdrawing cash (the machine returning the inserted cash to the user)
